description.raw:
Hi Carlos and/or Brian.  We were looking through the logs on our end, because we noticed a stark difference between the posted scores and what we were seeing on our end.  Turns out that our robot localization package was not configured correctly/not running on the server, and our vehicle was actually spinning in place for station keeping and not moving at all for waypoint tracking.  I have made the changes I believe will squash this bug and worked with the test server to confirm that our system runs as was intended \(probably should have been working with the test server earlier, but will from here on out\).  

I have pushed an update to our Dockerfile, namely so that robot localization and robot state publisher are installed, and this pull request is the submission of that.  I am hoping that you might be able to test just a few of the trials on your end and send back the scores.  To be clear, we are simply looking for confirmation that our system is running as intended on your end.  Thanks guys!
